text.div:
IPS CodeSystem - Absent and Unknown Data

International Patient Summary (IPS) codes for "known absent" and "not known" data.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/CodeSystem/absent-unknown-uv-ips defines the following codes:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinition
1allergic-disposition-not-known Allergic disposition not knownThere is no information available regarding the subject's allergy conditions.
1no-known-allergy No known allergyThe subject has no known allergy conditions.
2  no-known-medication-allergy No known medication allergyThe subject has no known medication allergy conditions.
2  no-known-environmental-allergy No known environmental allergyThe subject has no known environmental allergy conditions.
2  no-known-food-allergy No known food allergyThe subject has no known food allergy conditions.
1no-device-info No information about devicesThere is no information available regarding implanted or external devices for the subject.
1no-known-device No known devices in useThere are no devices known to be implanted in or used by the subject.
1no-immunization-info No information about immunizationsThe history of previous immunizations is not known.
1no-previous-immunizations No previous immunizationsThere is no history of previous immunizations.
1no-medication-info No information about current medicationsThere is no information available about the subject's current medication use or administration.
1no-current-medications No current medicationsThe subject is not taking or being administered any current medications.
1no-problem-info No information about current problemsThere is no information available about the subject's current health problems or disability.
1no-current-problems No current problemsThe subject is not known to have any current health problems or disability.
1no-procedure-info No information about past history of proceduresThere is no information available about the subject's past history of procedures.
1no-history-procedures No history of proceduresThe subject has no history of previous procedures.

name: IPSCodeSystemAbsentUnknown
title: IPS CodeSystem - Absent and Unknown Data
description: International Patient Summary (IPS) codes for "known absent" and "not known" data.

concept.definition: There is no information available regarding the subject's allergy conditions.
The subject has no known allergy conditions.
The subject has no known medication allergy conditions.
The subject has no known environmental allergy conditions.
The subject has no known food allergy conditions.
There is no information available regarding implanted or external devices for the subject.
There are no devices known to be implanted in or used by the subject.
The history of previous immunizations is not known.
There is no history of previous immunizations.
There is no information available about the subject's current medication use or administration.
The subject is not taking or being administered any current medications.
There is no information available about the subject's current health problems or disability.
The subject is not known to have any current health problems or disability.

concept.display: No information about past history of procedures
concept.definition: There is no information available about the subject's past history of procedures.
The subject has no history of previous procedures.
